title: Easy Invoice Pro
name: Easy Invoice Pro
excerpt: Easy Invoice Pro is the premium version of the Easy Invoice WordPress invoicing plugin. This extend features like export invoice csv, restrict invoice to client, client area with shortcode etc.

title: Easy Invoice AuthorizeNet
name: Easy Invoice AuthorizeNet
excerpt: Easy Invoice AuthorizeNet is a premium addon to the Easy Invoice WordPress plugin. This is a payment gateway addon for the Easy Invoice plugin. This is a gateway of authorize.net.
